title: Introducing The Art of Business Wars
description:
Today is Monday, March 29, and we’re giving listeners a sneak preview of our new book, The Art of Business Wars.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
